alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 12 at 11:58PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CHST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 130 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1155 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Minor flooding has been observed in poor drainage areas in Tiyan and Barrigada. Between 0.4 and 0.6 inches of rain have fallen. - Tiyan and Barrigada are the most likely areas to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.6 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Asan and Piti. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
